title: Wall Street Breakfast August 5: Sinema Agrees to Proceed with Senate Tax and Climate Bill
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Sinema agrees to proceed with the Senate tax and climate bill after carried interest pledge. Meta Platforms selling debt for first time with $10B deal. Apple accused of retaliating against, mishandling allegations against women: report. Markets will be looking for signs of cracking in Friday's jobs report. Catch today’s WSB article here.
